favourite.article: Channels of life are we, Allowing God to flow! Through us and out of us That others life may know!
Let us all be the channels of life.
O Lord Amen! Be strong! Be not weak!
This song is finally here! I've been enjoying it for years and it's been a real blessing!
Praise the Lord! We must exercise our function, which is to speak the highest truth. May the Lord continually supply us with His life, and may He also preserve us for His use. :)
